ygData.subject: Re: weight (was Re: Re:What to buy?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... As I play on Fennin Ro, one of the servers subject to frequent server crashes, I can only advise against the spirit pouch/dimensional pocket suggestion.
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:48 PM 2/8/00 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>
>
>
>My weight is around 10 or 11 most times.
>
>And soon after I log in, I auction for a couple of spirit pouches or
>dimensional pockets to put my loot in. Sure, they vanish when you log.
>Just have to make sure I sell before I do. There's usually a vendor
>somewhere nearby to where I'm hunting.
>
>-Raean Bloodyhands, Ashen Order, Tunare.

As I play on Fennin Ro, one of the servers subject to frequent server crashes,
I can only advise against the spirit pouch/dimensional pocket suggestion.
Since
they are no rent (i.e. they disappear when you camp), they have a tendency to
disappear after you go linkdead or are subject to a server burp. But, if you
find that you rarely experience server snafus, this is a wonderful alternative
to the weight problem.

In Quellious's Name,

Manjushri Bodhisattva
Bearer of the Red Sash of the Ashen Order
(Fennin Ro)
